name: Range is HOT!
description:
Range is HOT! is a VR competition shooting simulator. Shoot your way through a variety of targets and courses to get the lowest time possible. Climb the leaderboards and hone your skills from the comfort of your home. Did we mention the ammo is free?

Features
  • Multigun courses utilizing handgun, rifle, and shotgun shooting
  • Scout and practice course sections to develop a strategy for maximum effectiveness
  • Outdoor ranges and indoor shoothouses
